website_summaries.verdict: Bold graphics on the helmet are impressive, but it's the performance that matters. This is a great choice for hobby and welders-in-training, but professionals might want to look elsewhere.
pros: Uses both solar and battery power to operate electronics
4 sensors provide instant darkening during an arc flash
Thicker lens protects face while in grind mode
cons: Lens may not switch from 9 to 13 precisely, closer to "light or dark" gradations
Some say it isn't good for heavy-duty steel projects
